_header: In July when the sun shone sheen
_description: The Siege of Calais — twenty-eight 6-line stanzas and a final couplet

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
In Iuyl whan the sone schonCres Ienys & herbys
                    grene…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…Only god in whom ys allWan caleys þat Ryall
                    towne
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Added by a later hand to originally blank leaves at end of a volume; 164
                    lines ending (incomplete) at bottom of second column on f. 114.
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
her biginyth the sege off calays in the yer off our lord j M a iij C (by
                    scribe, f. 113va)
